bibl.title: Copronyms and the Exposure of Infants in Egypt.
bibl.note: A shorter version of this paper was delivered at the XVII Congr. Int. di Pap. (Naples, 1983). Cf. Atti XVII Congr. III (Napoli, 1984) p. 1341. - Pp. 149-157: List of 279 examples of names in "Kopr-" cited in documents from Egypt.

bibl.title: Studies in Roman Law in Memory of A. Arthur Schiller

bibl.seg: Pomeroy Sarah B., Copronyms and the Exposure of Infants in Egypt.
Roger S. Bagnall and William V. Harris (Edd.), Studies in Roman Law in Memory of A. Arthur Schiller (Leiden, 1986) pp. 147-162.

A shorter version of this paper was delivered at the XVII Congr. Int. di Pap. (Naples, 1983). Cf. Atti XVII Congr. III (Napoli, 1984) p. 1341. - Pp. 149-157: List of 279 examples of names in "Kopr-" cited in documents from Egypt.
